synopsis.text:
First ly, a special forces team on a mission to apprehend drug lords inadvertently stumbles upon an ancient cave, disrupting a mysterious ritual. The squad is nearly wiped out, with only two survivors: Shen La, a skilled sniper, and Sun Desheng, an anti-drug police officer. A mysterious white-haired man named Wu Hao rescues the duo, leading them to the enigmatic 'Civil Affairs Investigation and Research Bureau.' As they delve deeper into the bureau's affairs, Shen La and Sun Desheng find themselves entangled in a world of supernatural events.

During their first mission, Shen La discovers latent supernatural powers within himself, which attract both curiosity and concern from the bureau. As he successfully completes his mission and passes the bureau's examination, an internal conflict arises due to the nature of Shen La's newfound abilities. The organization remains divided on whether his powers will be a force for good or evil, leaving the ultimate decision in Shen La's hands.

Based on the novel of the same name by Er Dong Shui Shou, this anime follows Shen La and Sun Desheng as they navigate the treacherous waters of the supernatural world, ultimately shaping their destinies and the fate of the bureau.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
